title: 210. Is It Okay for Restaurants to Racially Profile Their Employees?
description: We seem to have decided that ethnic food tastes better when it's served by people of that ethnicity (or at least something close). Does this make sense -- and is it legal?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
